story.title: Our Story
story.content: Welcome to MarbleWorks, where craftsmanship meets excellence. With years of experience in the industry, we specialize in providing high-quality marble solutions for both residential and commercial projects.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Our mission is to deliver premium marble products that enhance the beauty and value of every space. We take pride in sourcing the finest materials and combining them with expert craftsmanship to create timeless and durable designs.

items.title: High-quality, natural marble
items.description: Sourced from the finest quarries worldwide

items.title: Expert craftsmanship
items.description: Skilled artisans with years of experience

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our marble products and services

items.question: What is marble?
items.answer: Marble is a natural stone used for construction and decoration.

items.question: How do I order marble?
items.answer: You can place an order via our website or contact our sales team.

items.question: Where can I learn more about marble?

contact.title: Contact
contact.location: Location - Near Satsang Mandir , Junagard Road

social.title: Connect With Us
social.description: Follow us on social media for updates and inspiration

hero.title: Premium Granite Collection
hero.subtitle: Explore our selection of durable granite stones, known for their strength and natural beauty.

products.name: Absolute Black Granite
products.description: Deep black granite with subtle flecks, perfect for elegant contrast

specifications.applications: Countertops, floors, exterior facades, and high-traffic commercial areas
specifications.maintenance: Seal once a year, clean with granite-specific cleaner

products.name: Baltic Brown Granite
products.description: Reddish-brown base with black, white, and burgundy mineral deposits

specifications.applications: Kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities, fireplace surrounds
specifications.maintenance: Seal annually, clean with pH neutral cleaner

products.name: Blue Pearl Granite
products.description: Iridescent blue-gray with sparkling silver and blue minerals

specifications.applications: Countertops, feature walls, and luxury commercial installations
specifications.maintenance: Seal annually, daily cleaning with mild cleaners

products.name: Kashmir Gold Granite
products.description: Warm gold background with burgundy and black mineral patterns

specifications.applications: Statement countertops, accent walls, and high-end installations
specifications.maintenance: Seal every 6-12 months, clean with specialized stone cleaner

products.name: Venetian Gold Granite
products.description: Beige background with gold, brown, and black mineral inclusions

specifications.applications: Kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities, and bar tops
specifications.maintenance: Seal every 6 months, clean with gentle granite cleaner

products.name: Dakota Mahogany Granite
products.description: Rich mahogany red with consistent black mineral patterns

specifications.applications: Exterior cladding, monuments, flooring, and countertops

hero.title: Luxury Marble Collection
hero.subtitle: Discover our premium selection of natural marble stones, sourced from the finest quarries worldwide.

products.name: Calacatta Gold
products.description: Luxurious white marble with dramatic gold veining

specifications.applications: Luxury countertops, feature walls, and high-end installations
specifications.maintenance: Seal every 6 months, clean with marble-specific cleaner

products.name: Emperador Dark
products.description: Rich brown marble with fine veining

specifications.maintenance: Annual sealing, regular cleaning with pH-neutral cleaner

products.name: Statuario
products.description: Premium white marble with elegant gray veining

specifications.maintenance: Seal every 6 months, gentle daily cleaning

products.name: Nero Marquina
products.description: Deep black marble with striking white veins

specifications.maintenance: Annual sealing, regular cleaning with stone cleaner

products.name: Carrara White
products.description: Timeless white marble with soft gray veining

specifications.maintenance: Seal every 6 months, daily cleaning with gentle cleaners

products.name: Portoro Gold
products.description: Dramatic black marble with golden veining

specifications.applications: Luxury accent features, statement walls, and high-end installations
specifications.maintenance: Seal every 6 months, clean with specialized marble cleaner

hero.title: Why Choose
hero.subtitle: Experience unparalleled quality and service with our premium marble solutions

features.title: Premium Selection
features.description: Curated collection of the finest marble from around the world, ensuring exceptional quality and unique patterns.

features.title: Expert Craftsmanship
features.description: Skilled artisans with decades of experience in marble cutting, polishing, and installation.

features.title: Lifetime Warranty
features.description: Our confidence in quality is backed by a comprehensive lifetime warranty on all installations.

hero.title: Our Product Collections
hero.subtitle: Explore our premium natural stone and tile collections for your home or commercial projects.

categories.name: Marble
categories.description: Discover our exquisite selection of premium marble slabs and tiles, sourced from the finest quarries around the world.

categories.name: Granite
categories.description: Explore our extensive selection of durable, natural granite stone for countertops, flooring, and outdoor applications.

categories.name: Tile
categories.description: Browse our curated selection of ceramic, porcelain, and natural stone tiles for floors, walls, and decorative accents.

hero.title: Loved by
hero.subtitle: Discover why our clients choose us for their luxury marble needs.

reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
reviews.review: Absolutely stunning marble quality! The veining patterns are exactly what I was looking for in my latest design project.

reviews.name: Michael Chen
reviews.review: The attention to detail in their marble selection is unmatched. A true game-changer for luxury spaces.

reviews.name: Emma Thompson
reviews.review: Working with MarbleCo was a dream. They helped me choose the perfect marble for my kitchen renovation.

hero.title: Designer Tile Collection
hero.subtitle: Explore our curated selection of ceramic, porcelain, and specialty tiles from around the world.

products.name: Porcelain Wood-Look Tile
products.description: Realistic wood-grain porcelain tiles with exceptional durability

specifications.applications: Indoor floors, outdoor patios, commercial spaces

products.name: Moroccan Pattern Ceramic
products.description: Intricate geometric patterns in vibrant colors

products.name: Large Format Porcelain
products.description: Modern large-format tiles with marble-like appearance

specifications.applications: Large spaces, feature walls, modern installations

products.name: Classic Subway Tile
products.description: Timeless white rectangular tiles with beveled edges

specifications.applications: Kitchen backsplashes, bathroom walls, shower surrounds
specifications.maintenance: Regular cleaning with mild detergent, check grout annually

products.name: Terrazzo Durable Tile
products.description: Contemporary terrazzo-look porcelain with colorful aggregate pattern

specifications.applications: Modern floors, commercial spaces, statement walls
specifications.maintenance: Standard cleaning, resistant to most chemicals

products.name: Glass Mosaic Tile
products.description: Iridescent glass mosaic tiles with reflective properties

specifications.applications: Backsplashes, shower accents, swimming pools, decorative features
specifications.maintenance: Clean with glass cleaner, avoid abrasives
